A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There are moments of greatness in an overwhelmingly poorly written farce of a Star Wars movie. \n      The main problem\, besides the sloppy writing\, is the enormous leaps in logic the director expects the audience to make.  \n    I'm not saying my expectations are dampening my experience\, but when you hype all these plot points and characters up for 2 years and don't deliver people are going to be upset.
